text: Atarku allah â€œunmai collum cattiyavankalukku avarkalutaiya unmai palanalikkakkutiya nal itutan. Totarntu niraruvikal otik kontirukkum corkkankalum avarkalukku untu. Atil avarkal enrenrume tankivituvarkal'' enru kuruvan. (Annalil) avarkalaip parri allahvum makilcciyataivan. Avarkalum avanaip parri makilcciyataivarkal. Itu mikka makattana perum pakkiyam akum
